title.english: InuYasha the Movie 3: Swords of an Honorable Ruler
title.native: 犬夜叉 天下覇道の剣

synonyms: InuYasha: The Sword of the World Conquest
InuYasha: The Sword That Rules Over the Empires
InuYasha The Movie 3: La Spada del Dominatore del Mondo
InuYasha - Die Schwerter, die die Welt unterwerfen
description:
Izayoi and Inu no Taishou, Inuyasha's parents, are having problems with a human named Setsuna no Takemaru. Sou'unga a magical sword that has been sealed away for 700 years is found. Now everyone is after the sword and its powers but it seems the sword has something else in mind.

(Source: Anime News Network)
